text: Hurricane Patricia of 2015 was the strongest hurricane ever recorded in the Western Hemisphere. The storm was headed for western Mexico. Its winds grew to Category 5 level and reached 215 mph. Patricia had the highest hurricane winds since Hurricane Linda in 1997. On April 25, 2016, the name Patricia was retired and replaced with Pamela. ==References== Category:Hurricanes in Mexico Category:2015 in weather Category:2010s in Mexico Category:Retired tropical cyclone names
title: Hurricane Patricia
